meanings.definition: A type of fish found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The porgy swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating porgy when it's freshly caught.
meanings.sent3: Why did the porgy bring a suitcase to the beach? It wanted to have a 'shore' vacation!
meanings.sent4: The porgy glided through the water like a silver arrow.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the porgy caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A type of edible fish often used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using porgy.
meanings.sent2: Porgy is a popular choice for seafood recipes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the porgy refuse to be fried? It didn't want to end up in hot water!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the grilled porgy filled the kitchen with mouthwatering scents.
meanings.sent5: The tender meat of the porgy melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly caught by anglers.
meanings.sent1: The angler proudly displayed the porgy they caught.
meanings.sent2: Porgy fishing is a popular pastime in this area.
meanings.sent3: Why did the porgy refuse to be bait? It didn't want to be hooked on a bad deal!
meanings.sent4: The porgy fought against the fishing line with determination.
meanings.sent5: The angler's heart raced as the porgy tugged on the line, putting up a good fight.
